sentences.sContent: The dishwasher is a wonderful invention.
sentences.sCn: 洗碗机是一项奇妙的发明。

sentences.sContent: ...Internet has been one of the most transformative developments in human history, comparable in impact to the invention of the printing press and the telegraph...

synos.tran: [专利]发明；发明物；虚构；发明才能

words.tran: 发明的；有发明才能的；独出心裁的
发明家；[专利] 发明人；创造者

trans.tranOther: a useful machine, tool, instrument etc that has been invented
